channel.description: Recent content in introduction on Statistics for Experiments

item.title: First Post
item.description:
Welcome to my blog!

I think blogging is a nice way to learn, share and improve. While I do not have a precise list of topics I will discuss, I’ll guide you through some of the most recurrent statistical issues and fundamental doubts I have faced during my PhD training and beyond.

Hope you enjoy it!
